title: A booke of presidentes exactly written in maner of a register. Newly corrected, with additions of dyuers necessarie presidents, meete for al such as desire to learne the fourme and maner how to make all maner of euidences, and instruments, as in the table of this booke more plainlie appeareth.
author: Phayer, Thomas, 1510?-1560, attributed name.
notes: Sometimes ascribed to Thomas Phayer who wrote the preface to the 1543 edition. Phayer's preface dropped from editions following 1546.--STC.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
